_header: When Jesu was in this world here
_description: ‘Genelogia Cristo ascendendo que legitur in epiphania’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When ihesu was in þis werld hereIn þe elde of thretty ȝere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þus may men here how iohn þe baptistffor oure bote batist Ihesu crist
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Factum est cum baptizaretur omnis populus.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Genelogia cristo ascendendo que legitur in epiphania (rubric, f. 30ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.263-268.
